text: Jan Kanty Fontana (1731 - 1800) was an architect, surveyor and burgrave of the Royal Castle, Warsaw. He was the son of Józef Fontana and the younger brother of Jakub Fontana. He was ennobled by King Stanisław August Poniatowski on 9 September 1769 and received his own coat of arms, Fontana. ==References== Category:Architects from Warsaw Category:1731 births Category:1800 deaths
title: Jan Kanty Fontana
